body.name: TP-Link Wifi 6 AX1500 Smart WiFi Router (Archer AX10) 802.11ax Router, Dual Band AX Router,Beamforming,OFDMA, MU-MIMO, Parental Controls, Works with Alexa (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 55 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: JD Power Award ---Highest in customer satisfaction for wireless routers 2017 and 2019
Wi-Fi 6 Router: Archer AX10 comes equipped with latest wireless technology WiFi6 featuring OFDMA 1024-QAM, drastically increasing the speed and efficiency of the entire network.
Next-gen Dual Band router – 300 Mbps on 2. 4 GHz (802. 11n) + 1201 Mbps on 5 GHz (802. 11ax)
Connect more devices than ever before Wi-Fi 6 technology simultaneously communicates more data to more devices using OFDMA and MU-MIMO while reducing lag dramatically
Triple-core processing the 1. 5 GHz tri-core processor ensures communications between your router and all connected devices are smooth and Buffer-Free
More coverage with less interference achieve the strongest most reliable Wi-Fi coverage with Archer AX10 As it focuses signal strength to your devices using Beamforming technology.
Backward compatible Archer AX10 supports all previous 802. 11 standards and all Wi-Fi devices

Easy setup set up your internet router in minutes with the powerful TP-Link tether app. Compatible with 11a/b/g/n/ac Wi-Fi standards. System Requirements-Microsoft Windows 98SE/NT/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10, MAC OS, NetWare, UNIX or Linux, Internet Explorer 11, Firefox 12.0, Chrome 20.0, Safari 4.0, or other, Java-enabled browser,Cable or DSL Modem. Wireless Functions-Enable/Disable Wireless Radio, WMM
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Replaced an OLD router and extender in our 2 story house. Easy set up. Refurbished acts like new. I get 4 to 5 wifi bars, with minimal new fiber optic service, (rural area). Thanks for the infrastructure package USA!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a great value!
reviews.reviewText: I needed to replace a very old router for the upstairs of our house. The speed of the old router was pretty slow by today's standards, and we were losing connection quickly going downstairs. I was feeling a bit of sticker shock as I looked for a wifi 6 router we could use, until I found the TP-Link. We've had it for about a month now, with no issues, and fantastic download speeds, matching the top end of what our internet service claims to give us. It has also been great for wireless use of our Oculus Quest 2.The most difficult thing for our specific installation was that we needed it to be installed as an additional router to our network. The trick to doing so turned out to be setting it to "Access Point Mode" (System -> Operation Mode). Oh, and you should plug the ethernet cable from your base system into the blue uplink slot, not one of the wlan slots (which my old router used).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value as an access point...
reviews.reviewText: It's part of my existing network as an additional access point (#3). Now, my relatively large house has wall-to-wall WiFi coverage. I'm able to receive a relatively strong signal despite being in the 🔥 hot attic. It has its own subnet via Vlan, which helps to keep my less secured devices isolated, IoT, from interacting with other more secured devices on my LAN. It appears that tp-link has improved the firmware. It's now more informative & easier to navigate. Since it's a refurbished device, I had to factory reset it & update the firmware. It was easy peasy to set it up. Warning, it's not plug & play... it comes with no instructions, therefore, less experienced users may struggle to set it up. It has been working flawlessly for almost two months. It appears to be new, no scratches or dents, despite being an Amazon renewed device. Overall, this is a great little device as an AP for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bang for the buck
reviews.reviewText: Streaming with FUBO now. My other tp link router was making the picture fuzzy on two TV’s during live gameplay. Not a technical wiz but purchased this for my fix. It works great. Now I can stream Bally Sports better. Still keeping my older tp link router in case. It still works of course. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Value - Nice Router (Especially For The Price)
reviews.reviewText: When I installed T-Mobile 5G Home Internet to replace my former cable service, I discovered that the router that T-Mobile supplies allows almost zero customization capability for my home wi-fi network. My home network is somewhat complex, with a spectrum of different devices, the need for 2.4g and 5g connectivity, and with various other technical considerations which I won't get into here. So I needed to find an inexpensive, separate router that I could handle my requirements while fitting in seamlesslessly with T-Mobile's service.This router works exactly as expected - has all of the features I need, straightforward to set up, and, as a refurbished device at a refurbished price point, it looks just like new and offered excellent value for the money. Just provide the ethernet feed from the T-Mobile device, log in,, perform the customization, and it's good to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Price for a High Perforamance Refurbished Router
reviews.reviewText: What's in the Box?- 1 x Router- 1 x Power Adapter- 1 x Ethernet CableWhat to do after receiving the package?- open the box- plug in the router to power- factory reset the router- update the router- setup the router- game or stream to your heart's desireThe router we received came in great condition, with some factory plastic still wrapped in factory protective plastic. Since it is refurbished, I could not login to setup the router as the password was changed, so I factory reset it. Once in the setup, I found that the firmware was ancient, so I updated it to the latest version. After that, setup was a breeze. Gave it to a friend to run a combination for SOHO work, streaming and gaming. The router is fast, quiet, and does not get hot. Definitely recommended if you are on a budget and need a high performance router.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars GARBAGE constantly disconnects from devices
reviews.reviewText: This router is a completely worthless piece of junk.My devices that have logged into the network with the proper password will randomly at times be unable to connect and tell me there is no internet network connection. I check the app and supposedly it tells me everything is working normal. I disconnect from the wifi and re-enter the password, it will show I have a WiFi connection but still no internet connection. The problem was only solved if I unplugged the router, changed the network name and password, and reconnected. Even then my devices would only remain connected for around 24 hours then would consistently loose internet connection again. This is unacceptable because I have a wifi based security camera system, so whenever this piece of junk disconnected my devices I would not have home security.I never write reviews but am pleading that anyone who reads this please do not waste your money on this absolutely terrible product. I wish I could give it 0 stars. Completely worthless trash and garbage product. Terrible.
